svg.text: Where Structured Reasoning Makes the Difference

g.text: self-critique. Find SQL injection, XSS, memory
leaks, and logic flaws before they ship.
Build knowledge graphs from first principles.
Devil's advocate perspective on every option.
citations. GDPR, SOC2, HIPAA checklist audit.
Policy gap analysis with remediation steps.
Market sizing validation against multiple sources.
Red flag detection with adversarial critique.
Combine multiple ThinkTools in custom sequences for complex workflows. Security audit ‚Üí Compliance check ‚Üí Decision matrix ‚Üí Documentation.

svg.text: ReasonKit | Turn Prompts into Protocols | reasonkit.sh
